4. Sebastian Griffin

# Sebastian Griffin

# DISTRICT 6

## Sebastian Griffin was sworn in as a Nampa City Councilman for District 6 on January 2, 2024. Nampa City Council members are elected to four-year terms, concluding in December of 2026.

Sebastian Griffin is a 5th generation Idahoan and a Nampa native. He and his wife Macy met while attending Nampa High School and have strong roots in the community. Sebastian is a graduate from College of Western Idaho, Boise State University, and is currently attending University of Idaho, College of Law in Boise. He is pursuing a joint Juris Doctor and Masters in Accounting and Taxation.

Sebastian is a small business owner, and comes from a family of entrepreneurs. He has owned his Marketing and Consulting firm, Griffin Marketing (formerly Griffin and Griffin Consulting), for five years.

Sebastian is one of Idaho’s youngest authors of a major education bill, which passed and was signed into law in 2019, Senate Bill 1060. He has previously served as a board member for Nampa Lions Club and Ada County Lincoln Day Association. 

In his free time you’ll find Sebastian and his family enjoying the beauties of Idaho’s great outdoors. They are avid river rafters, campers, and hunters. If you’re lucky, you might also catch a quick glimpse of Sebastian on the back of a bull in a local rodeo.

To stay up-to-date on the happenings of Councilman Griffin, please follow or contact him on any of the following platforms:

Facebook: [Griffin for Nampa](https://www.facebook.com/Griffinforidaho)  
Instagram: [Griffin for Nampa](https://www.instagram.com/griffinfornampa) 

Email: [griffins@cityofnampa.us](mailto:griffins@cityofnampa.us)

![Sebastian Griffin](https://www.cityofnampa.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=17735 "Sebastian Griffin")
